info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 3:16PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Marshall County through 345 PM CDT... At 315 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Henry, or near Lacon, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Marshall County, including the following locations... Lake Wildwood, Marshall-Putnam County Fairgrounds, Marshall County Airport and Hopewell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
